CustomField.description: Records the precise DateTime (LastModifiedDate) from the source record at the moment of capture. This allows the Sync Engine to handle "High-Water Mark" logic based on Event Time rather than Processing Time, preventing stale syncs from overwriting newer data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The DateTime when the change actually occurred on the source record. Used for conflict resolution.
CustomField.label: SourceEventTimestamp
